title: Unvaccinated North Korea Locks Down After Reporting First Local Covid Infection - The Wall Street Journal
content:
1. Unvaccinated North Korea Locks Down After Reporting First Local Covid Infection  The Wall Street Journal

  4. North Korea declares 'major national emergency' as first case of Covid-19 identified, state media reports  CNN

description: North Korea, which hasnâ€™t vaccinated its population, imposed a lockdown in all its major cities after it reported its first local case of Covid-19 more than two years after the pandemic began.
